name: Lost Paws
description:
Experience the world as a stray dog! Jump, dig, bark, and bonk your way through human society and wilderness to survive. Customize your appearance with various items and even acquire special skills and abilities that change the way you play the game. You decide what kind of doggo you’ll be!


Become a good doggo


Or become a bad doggo


Choose the type of doggo you want to be!


Lost Paws features:
  • Live the life of a stray dog
  • Survive in a vast open world
  • Gain wacky dog skills throughout the game
  • Encounter a wide variety of different humans
  • Go on various special missions
  • Customize your dog with all sorts of acquirable hats and items
  • Bonk all kinds of people and items with physics
  • Utilize an RPG system to choose your style of play
  • Transcend beyond just a mere doggo

Whether you want to scavenge for food in a forest, try your paws at raiding super stores, or something else entirely, you get to decide what sort of doggo you’ll become. Let your doggo story be written by your actions and adventures, but maybe with some cool glasses too!
